title.en: Tears by Day, Love by Night

description.en:
The first time, I wasn't considered a priority. Then, it didn't feel right to date men. The third time, I went on a blind date, to discover that I was dating a married man.  
  
Eunsoo's relationships always ended badly.  
  
But it's different this time. Just as he was about to be beaten up, Eunsoo is comforted by Hajoon, who appeared like a knight.   
  
But why would you… You're even comforting me in my dreams?!

April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

altTitles.th: แบล็กโคลเวอร์

description.en:
Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church, and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover"! Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal!

---

**Links:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802) (special)  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) (anime)
description.fr:
Asta et Yuno ont été abandonné ensemble à la même église, et sont inséparables depuis. Enfants, ils promirent qu'ils seront en compétition pour voir qui sera le prochain Mage Empereur. Toutefois, en grandissant, quelques différences entre eux émergèrent. Yuno était un génie avec la magie avec un pouvoir et un contrôle incroyable, pendant qu'Asta ne pouvait pas du tout utiliser la magie, et essayait de compenser cela en entrainant son corps. Quand ils reçoivent leur grimoire à 15 ans, Yuno obtient ub kivre spectaculaire avec un trèfle à 4 feuilles (la plupart des gens reçoivent un trèfle à 3 feuilles), pendant qu'Asta ne reçoit rien du tout. Toutefois, quand Yuno fut menaçé, la vérité derrière le pouvoir d'Asta fut révélée. Il reçoit un grimoire avec un trèfle à 5 feuilles, un "trèfle noir" *(un "black clover")* ! Maintenant, les deux amis s'en vont vers la capitale, les deux cherchant le même objectif !


**Liens:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802)  *(special)* 
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) *(anime)*
description.pl: Asta to młody chłopak, który marzy o zostaniu największym magiem w królestwie. Jest tylko jeden problem: nie potrafi używać żadnej magii. Na szczęście otrzymuje Pięciolistną Koniczynę, niesamowicie rzadką księgę czarów, dzięki której chłopak zyskuje moc niwelowania wszelkiej magii. Czy ktoś, kto nie używa magii, może zostać Imperatorem Magii, magiem nad magami? Jedno wiemy na pewno: Asta nigdy się nie podda.Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!
description.ru: В мире, где магия – это всё, рождается мальчик Астер, который не в состоянии использовать какую-либо магию. Ещё ребенком он был оставлен у порога бедной церкви. Сейчас ему 15, и, чтобы доказать свою силу и сдержать обещание, данное другу, он стремится стать Королём Чародеев!
description.pt-br: Em um mundo em que até as tarefas mais simples do dia a dia são feitas com o uso de magia, quem não consegue usá-la é tratado como nada! Esta é a vida de Asta, um jovem que mesmo sem um pingo de magia, sonha em se tornar o Mago Imperador, o mais forte de todos os magos! Com muito esforço e trabalho duro, será ele capaz de atingir seus objetivos e superar seu genial rival e amigo de infância, Yuno?!!

description.en:
Set in the France 1835. The pretty Rose Dupre is bullied and called the witch's daughter. People say her mother is a witch who kills and eats humans. However, Marie and Peter don't believe all those rumors and decide to protect Rose… But what if the rumors are true?  

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Kakao Webtoon](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B0%BD%EB%B0%B1%ED%95%9C-%EB%A7%90/783)
- Defunct Official English - [SpotToon](https://www.spottoon.com/workHome/39/THE%20PALE%20HORSE), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/palehorse)

**Note:**
- The author has split the storyline into parts and seasons. Volume 1.1 for example means Part 1, Season 1.
description.id: Di kota Prancis yang dilanda ketakutan, Rose Dupre diintimidasi sebagai putri penyihir. Marie dan Pierre tidak percaya rumor seperti itu pada awalnya. Tetapi ketika gelombang kematian aneh menyapu, ketiga anak itu tidak lagi aman dari mata yang waspada. Bisakah Rose selamat dari kutukan sihir dan kecurigaan? Sebuah kisah gothic yang luas namun penuh warna dimulai.
description.zh:
在充满恐惧流言的法国小镇上，Rose Dupre作为女巫的女儿被欺凌。朋友玛丽和皮特起初并不相信这样的谣言。但是，当一波奇怪的死亡浪潮席卷而来时，三个孩子再也逃不过警惕的眼睛了。罗斯能从魔法和怀疑的诅咒中幸存下来吗?一个宏大而丰富多彩的哥特式故事开始了。

Source : Bato

altTitles.th: AOASHI แข้งเด็กหัวใจนักสู้

description.de: Aoi Ashito ist ein Mittelschüler im dritten Jahr aus Ehime. Hinter seinem rohen Spiel verbirgt sich sein immenses Talent, aber Ashito erleidet wegen seiner allzu geradlinigen Persönlichkeit einen großen Rückschlag. Der Manager der Jugendmannschaft des J1-Clubs Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, erscheint vor Ashito. Fukuda sieht Ashitos grenzenloses Potenzial und lädt ihn ein, an den Probespielen seines Teams in Tokio teilzunehmen. Die Geschichte des Jungen, der den Fußball in Japan revolutionieren wird, beginnt sich schnell zu entfalten.
description.en:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
description.ru: Ашито Аой, ученик третьего класса средней школы из префектуры Эхиме, встречает тренера «Молодежной лиги J» Фукуду Тацую. Несмотря на свою грубость, Ашито обладает таким удивительным потенциалом, что тренер Фукуда приглашает его принять участие в отборочных тестах своей команды в Токио. Взгляните на историю мальчика, который совершит революцию в японском футболе.
description.tr: Aoi Ashito Ehime'de ortaokul 3. sınıfa giden bir öğrencidir. Bir gün karşısına J1 Ligi kulübü Tokyo City Esperion'un altyapı takımı menajeri Fukuda Tetsuya çıkar. Fukuda Aoi'nin sonsuz potansiyelini farkeder ve onu Tokyo'daki altyapı seçmelerine davet eder. Böylece Japon futbolunda devrim yapacak çocuğun hikayesi başlar.
description.pt-br: Ashito Aoi, um estudante do terceiro ano do ensino médio de Ehime, conhece Fukuda Tatsuya, um treinador da "J Youth League". Mesmo que ainda tenha uma personalidade forte, Ashito tem um incrível potêncial que o fez ser convidado pelo treinador Fukuda para participar da seleção de sua equipe em Tóquio. A história do garoto que vai revolucionar o futebol no Japão vai começar.

description.en:
“I wish to have you by my left shoulder, with a smile by my right– I wish to run freely in your eyes– I wish for one look to last a lifetime.”   
  
Jiang Cheng, an accomplished student, was "exiled" to the steel mill where his biological father worked. This strange, foreign environment, coupled with his rather vulgar biological father, caused Jiang Cheng to feel quite depressed… that is, until one day, he met Gu Fei, the "Delinquent of the Steel Mill", by chance. Thus begins the story of Jiang Cheng and Gu Fei, a story of salvation and hope…

(by Jupiter Scanlations)

altTitles.en: I Am the Most Beautiful Khun Khun in Siam

altTitles.th: ฉันนี่แหละท่านขุนที่สวยที่สุดในสยาม

description.fr:
Après avoir surmonté de nombreux obstacles en tant que personne LGBTQ+, Prin est devenu une star à succès. Mais, il se réveille dans le corps d'un noble d'une époque révolue, « Volard », qui était homosexuel comme lui. Alors qu'il pensait d'abord mener une vie tranquille et trouver un moyen de retourner dans son monde d'origine, il se trouve entraîné dans des événements politiques imminents.
« Je me contente d'ignorer tout et de profiter des privilèges que je reçois en tant que fils du gouverneur. Je me fiche de savoir qui souffre... MAIS si je dois vivre dans ce monde où les personnes LGBTQ+ comme moi seront étiquetées comme mauvaises pour toujours, je parierai sur le fait de le changer moi-même ! »

« Je n'ai besoin ni d'amour ni de reconnaissance. Ce dont j'ai besoin, c'est de pouvoir. ». Après avoir affronté la mort sans en comprendre les raisons, elle découvre les secrets de la mortalité. Alors qu'elle lutte, l'esprit de la mort apparaît aux côtés d'Azelda, lui offrant une nouvelle chance de vivre. Pour devenir un esprit redoutable dans sa quête de vengeance, elle se consacre à son entraînement. « Tu dois passer la nuit ici avec moi », insiste-t-elle. Faisant fi des sentiments, Azelda s'adresse d'abord à son mari, Seid, qui lui a tourné le dos dans leur quête commune de pouvoir et de vengeance.

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

title.en: On My Way To See My Mom

altTitles.en: On the Way to Meet Mom

description.en:
Mori, a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house, wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life, one day, he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a "mom" when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: "Could this person... be my mom?"
This is the story of Mori's long and challenging journey to find his mom.
description.ko: 폐가에서 발견된 아이 '모리'는 구조대에 의해 보호소에서 눈을 뜬다. 익숙하지 않은 생활에 적응하던 어느 날 후원자에게 조건 없는 사랑을 받고 자라는데.. 친하게 지내던 친구가 엄마와 떠나고, 엄마라는 존재가 있다는 걸 알게 된 아이는 생각한다. 혹시 이 사람이.. 나의 엄마가 아닐까? 모리의 멀고도 험한 엄마 만나러 가는 이야기.

altTitles.en: Everyone Is Under the Baby’s Feet
Everything Is Under the Baby's Feet

altTitles.ja: すべてはお嬢様の手の中に

description.en: Stella, the beloved princess of Tyrien, was imprisoned all her life before being used in an eerie sacrifice. After her consciousness fades away, she wakes up to find herself hatching from an egg as a child! Despite her initial bewilderment, Stella quickly adapts to her new life as "Leticia" and becomes attached to Beth, a kind professor who may hold the key to finding out who and what she is. But does Leticia have what it takes to uncover the secrets behind both her lives?
description.fr: Stella, la princesse bien-aimée de Tyrien, a été emprisonnée toute sa vie avant d'être utilisée pour un étrange sacrifice. Après avoir perdu connaissance, elle se réveille et découvre qu'elle a éclos d'un œuf en tant qu'enfant ! Malgré sa perplexité initiale, Stella s'adapte rapidement à sa nouvelle vie en tant que « Leticia » et s'attache à Beth, une gentille professeure qui pourrait bien détenir la clé pour découvrir qui elle est et ce qu'elle est. Mais Leticia a-t-elle ce qu'il faut pour découvrir les secrets qui se cachent derrière ses deux vies ?

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランド オーダー－モルターリス：ステラ－

description.en: The official adaptation of the TYPE-MOON phenomenon that has become one of the most popular mobile games in the world! The year is 2016, and glitches found in humanity’s past threaten the sustainability of its future. The Chaldea Security Organization - tasked with preserving human history for as long and as strongly as possible - has developed a new method of time travel to repair these events, stabilizing humanity’s future. But when an unknown threat pushes mankind to the brink of extinction, young recruits Mash Kyrielight and Ritsuka Fujimaru find themselves at the helm of the rescue mission: Obtain the Holy Grail in a face off against fate itself …
description.id:
Tahun 2016, dan gangguan yang ditemukan di masa lalu umat manusia mengancam keberlanjutan masa depannya. Organisasi Keamanan Chaldea–yang bertugas melestarikan sejarah manusia selama dan sekuat mungkin–telah mengembangkan metode baru perjalanan waktu untuk memperbaiki peristiwa ini, menstabilkan masa depan umat manusia. Tetapi ketika ancaman yang tidak diketahui mendorong umat manusia ke ambang kepunahan, rekrutan muda Mash Kyrielight dan Ritsuka Fujimaru menemukan diri mereka di pucuk pimpinan misi penyelamatan. Dapatkan Cawan Suci dalam menghadapi takdir itu sendiri… Adaptasi resmi dari TYPE-MOON fenomena yang telah menjadi salah satu game mobile paling populer di dunia!

Holy Grail War seorang gadis dan pemuda dimulai! Mash Kyrielight yang berafiliasi dengan Organisasi Pelindung Umat Manusia, Chaldea, bergabung dalam misi melindungi sejarah umat manusia. Di hari yang sama, dia bertemu dengan seorang pemuda bernama Ritsuka Fujimaru yang tertidur di ruang istirahat..?

Didistribusi di Indonesia oleh [Gramedia](https://www.gramedia.com/products/fategrand-order-mortalis-stella-01)
description.ru: Альтернативная манга-адаптация основных сюжетных актов игры Fate/Grand Order. Покрывает акты Фуюки, Орлеан, Септем, Лондон, Камелот. Повествование ведется от лица Маш.

title.en: The Moon on a Rainy Night

altTitles.fr: The Moon on a Rainy Night (Meian)

altTitles.pt-br: A Lua em uma Noite Chuvosa

altTitles.es-la: La luna en una noche lluviosa

description.en: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her.
description.ja:
2人の少女の、目には見えないもの、かけがえのないこと。

金田一咲希は高校入学直前のある日、ピアノレッスンに向かう途中で見知らぬ同世代の少女とぶつかり手を擦りむくが、相手から無言のまま真っすぐに見つめられた後、落とした楽譜を丁寧に拾われ絆創膏をもらう。咲希は印象的だったその少女とクラスメイトとして再会し、名前が及川奏音、そして耳が不自由だと知る。学校では障害を理由に周囲と距離を置く奏音に、淋しさを覚えた咲希はどうにか分かり合おうとし、そんな彼女の姿に奏音の態度も次第に変わっていき…。
description.ko: 고등학교에 입학한 사키와 귀가 불편한 반 친구 카논. 사람들과 거리를 두는 카논이 안고 있는 것과 겉으론 보이지 않는 것. 그것을 알고자 하는 사키에게 카논도 점차···. 두 소녀의 눈에는 보이지 않는 것, 둘도 없이 소중한 것.
description.pt-br: Um dia, pouco antes de entrar no colégio, Kazuki Kaneda colide com uma garota estranha da mesma geração a caminho da aula de piano e machuca sua mão, mas a partitura que caiu silenciosamente, da outra parte é cuidadosamente recolhida e um curativo é recebido. Saki se reúne com a garota impressionante como colega de classe e descobre que seu nome é Oikawa Kanon e ela é surda. Na escola, Saki, que estava sozinha, tentou entender o som de Kanon, que manteve distância do ambiente por causa de sua deficiência, e sua atitude mudou gradualmente.

title.en: The Male Leads Were Stolen by an Extra

altTitles.en: The Male Leads Were Taken Away by the Extra
The Male Leads Were Stolen by the Extra

description.en:
A woman who has lost her male leads to an extra who did not appear in the original story... That's me.

Selonia fell into a coma on the way back from defeating the Demon King. After wandering through death for several months, she survived, but what? 

“I want you to break off the engagement. I want to hurry up to marry Grace.” 

“I want you to pretend my knight’s oath to you didn't happen.” 

“Give me back my heart. I’ll give it to Grace.” 

The fiancé who was the male lead, the paladin and the dragon who were the sub-male leads, and the fellows all turned away. These reckless bastards! There was a lot of cursing, but what can I do to stop it? I was trying to start a new life in a cool way. By the way… 

“Do you know me?” 

How is the dead demon king alive? 

“What, I don’t know…”

“No, you know me. tell me Who am I?” 

To make matters worse, the Demon King, who has no memory, sticks to my side and does not leave. Inevitably, I tried my best to prevent the return of the Demon King. 

“How can I always hold your hand?” 

Why is it not enough to spit out vulgar words? 

“Are you going to kill all those who left you? Just speak.” 

He’s even going to kill the male leads for me!

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.

description.en: Worst but New Edition
description.vi: Liên minh Kurotaki sụp đổ, quyền lực của King Joe ở Housen dần bị mai một, Zetton bại trận trước Guriko đưa Suzuran vào thế hỗn loạn, Vũ Trang Chiến Tuyến ngày càng mạnh mẽ và bền bỉ... Trước tình cảnh đó thì ở Toaru bất ngờ xuất hiện một chàng trai đến từ ngoại thành mang tên Tsukishima Hana - kẻ mang ước mơ trở thành thủ lĩnh đầu tiên của toàn bộ Cao Trung Nam Sinh Suzuran vốn luôn hỗn loạn!

title.ja: I Don't Know Which Is Love

altTitles.ja: どれが恋かがわからない

altTitles.id: Aku Nggak Tau Yang Mana Cinta

altTitles.ja-ro: Dore ga Koi Ka ga Wakaranai

description.en: Our protagonist, Soraike Mei, confessed her unrequited love to her friend at the high school graduation ceremony… That was the plan, at least. Her confession was a failure. Because of that, she is keen to “Definitely get a girlfriend during college!” But for some reason, one woman after another keeps on approaching her?!
description.id: Mei, seorang gadis yang pernah merasakan pahitnya cinta yang telah direbut oleh suatu cowok pada saat kelulusan SMA, mencoba berusaha untuk menggaet cewek di Universitas. Namun, dalam kehidupan di kampusnya, dia tidak hanya didekati oleh 1 cewek, tetapi 5 cewek! Apakah Mei dapat bertahan hidup karenanya?

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.es-la: Völundio: Saga de las espadas divergentes

altTitles.vi: Volundio - Sử thi về mộng kiếm

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

description.en: First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.
description.es-la: Gu Feiyan, el tercer soberano, muere y es reencarnado en un niño llamado Li Yunxia, una completa basura que todavía no despertó sus meridianos a pesar de su edad. ¡Pero esto no detendrá al MC de alcanzar el pináculo de este mundo otra vez!
description.pt-br: Um dos imperadores marciais conferidos, Gu Feiyang, faleceu nas montanhas Tiandang e reencarnou 15 anos depois como Li Yunxiao, do estado de Tianshui, embarcando em uma jornada que desafia o céu contra os inúmeros gênios da época. Os nove níveis da Arte Marcial; os Reinos Divinos dos dez quadrantes. A partir de então, o mundo inteiro caiu no caos!

description.en: Takemura wakes up after falling ill for 3 days and realizes the world has been overrun by zombies but for some strange reason he is not being attacked by them! What will he do now with this great power he has?
description.id: Kehidupan sehari-hari pekerja kantor yang tidak disukai "Takemura" berubah dalam sekejap. Ketika aku perhatikan, itu adalah dunia yang penuh dengan zombie. Terlebih lagi, aku satu-satunya yang tidak diserang oleh zombie. "Bantu orang? Apa itu? Aku akan menjalani dunia ini sesukaku." Takemura memiliki banyak kekuatan di dunia apokaliptik di mana peradaban akan runtuh. Apakah dia satu-satunya pahlawan yang hidup dengan menyembunyikan fakta bahwa dia tidak diserang?
description.pt-br: Na sociedade atual, que foi completamente destruída por zumbis, há um homem que misteriosamente não é atacado por eles, e essa história segue sua estilo de vida egoísta. 18 Visualizações totais, 18 Visualizações hoje

altTitles.en: I grow stronger, devouring everything in my path

altTitles.ru: Я становлюсь сильнее, пожирая всё на своём пути

description.en:
Known as “Pet Shop,” Mr. Kim has the unique ability to absorb the skills of the creatures he eats. One day, Pet Shop is mysteriously transported to a magical world full of orcs, trolls, and monsters. A new world, new chow, and new skills. Now Pet Shop is determined to become the most powerful creature in the world. Follow his epic climb to the top of the food chain.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30674)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/appetit-feroce)
description.fr:
Les armes à feu du monde humain pouvaient arrêter notre héros, plus rien ne peut l’arrêter dans ce nouvel univers ! Réincarné dans une époque imaginaire, celui qu’on surnomme « L’animalerie » doit manger des animaux pour obtenir leurs aptitudes. Pour devenir plus fort, il doit allier quantité et qualité. Sa vie ressemble à un jeu vidéo où il faut gagner des compétences et il connaît les règles par cœur !

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30674)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/appetit-feroce)
description.id:
Setiap orang memiliki bakatnya masing-masing.

Dan bakat yang saya miliki adalah ‘makan’.

Bakat yang bersinar jauh lebih terang di dunia tempat tinggal organisme kuat yang tak terhitung jumlahnya.

Feast Devour.

Konsumsi darah dan daging yang kuat dan jadikan itu milik Anda.

Biarpun itu naga, raja iblis, atau dewa!
description.ko:
사람은 누구나 자신만의 재능을 가지고 있다. 그리고 그가 가진 재능은 바로 '먹는 것'이었다. 세계 곳곳을 돌아다니던 한국 출신의 국제범죄자 킴. 각종 범죄를 저지르던 킴은 국제경찰에 붙잡혀 호송되던 중 알 수 없는 세계에 빨려 들어간다. 그 세계에는 몬스터라 불리는 존재들이 가득했고, 그곳에서 킴은 모든 것을 먹어 치우며 최강의 생물을 꿈꾸게 된다. 나는 무엇이든 먹어 치울 것이다. 설령 그것이 드래곤이라 해도, 마왕이라 해도, 신이라 해도! 그리고 나는... 먹을수록 강해진다. <먹을수록 강해짐>

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30674)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/appetit-feroce)
description.ru:
«У каждого есть талант. Мой талант — есть».
Ким, международный преступник из Кореи, который скитался по миру и совершивший различные преступления, был пойман международной полицией и затянут в неизвестный мир.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30674)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/appetit-feroce)
description.zh:
每个人都有自己专属的才能，李先生拥有的技能便是“吃”！捕猎经历丰富，在世界各地逃亡的的李被国际警察抓捕归案，护送途中掉入了一个未知的世界。这个世界充满了各种怪物。在这里，李吃掉各种生物，梦想成为这个世界的最强者。“我将吃掉所有东西，无论它是龙，是魔王，还是神！而我，越吃越强！”

title.en: Is My Second Life a Healing Life?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha segunda vida é uma vida de cura?
Minha segunda vida é uma vida de curandeiro?

altTitles.en: My Second Life Is a  Healing Life?

description.en: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
description.pt-br: Eugene Felivia, o querido filho mais novo da nobre família Felivia, conhecida por seus grandes guerreiros, ganha uma segunda vida graças à graça de ‘Felin, o Feiticeiro da Criação’. Eugene sonha em se tornar um bruxo como Felin, que o salvou, e usar seus poderes para tornar o mundo um lugar melhor. No entanto, a realidade sombria e dura e o seu destino ainda se recusam a deixá-lo ir…

description.en:
Katou Narumi (19) suffers from Zonapha Syndrome, a rare ailment that stops his breathing unless he makes people laugh. He's been forced to abandon his training in Chinese kenpo and return to Japan, where he now works as a clown. The only problem: he's not very funny.  
  
One day he meets Saiga Masaru (11), the recent inheritor of a huge fortune, who gives him the first laugh he's gotten all day. When he realizes Masaru is being pursued by assassins, he steps in to protect the boy, only to discover that instead of conventional weapons, the assassins wield huge, eerie puppets. They soon encounter the mysterious Shirogane (age unknown), who controls a puppet of her own, and claims she was sent from France by Masaru's late grandfather to protect him.  
  
Their paths intertwine and diverge, splitting into two stories: Karakuri and Circus, puppets and performers, tears and laughter. The strange circus of living dolls that spreads Zonapha Syndrome, the human puppets known collectively as the Shirogane, and the puppeteers whose undying grudge set in motion both sides of this performance.
description.es-la:
Katou Narumi (19 años) sufre el síndrome de Zonapha, una rara dolencia que le impide respirar a menos que haga reír a la gente. Se ha visto obligado a abandonar su entrenamiento en kenpo chino y a regresar a Japón, donde ahora trabaja como payaso. El único problema: no es muy divertido.  
  
Un día conoce a Saiga Masaru (11), el reciente heredero de una enorme fortuna, que le hace reír por primera vez en todo el día. Cuando se da cuenta de que Masaru es perseguido por unos asesinos, interviene para proteger al chico, sólo para descubrir que, en lugar de armas convencionales, los asesinos empuñan enormes y espeluznantes marionetas. Pronto se encuentran con la misteriosa Shirogane (de edad desconocida), que controla una marioneta propia y afirma que fue enviada desde Francia por el difunto abuelo de Masaru para protegerlo.  
  
Sus caminos se entrelazan y divergen, dividiéndose en dos historias: Karakuri y el Circo, marionetas y artistas, lágrimas y risas. El extraño circo de muñecos vivientes que propaga el síndrome de Zonapha, las marionetas humanas conocidas colectivamente como los Shirogane, y los titiriteros cuyo rencor imperecedero puso en marcha las dos partes de este espectáculo.

description.en:
Tatsuya Uesugi, the older brother who has no relationship with the word "hard work," and Kazuya Uesugi, the younger brother who tries his hardest in everything he does. 

They are twin brothers. They have known Minami Asakura, the only daughter of the neighboring coffee shop "Minamikaze" since childhood. You can't take your eyes off the "youth" of these three...!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2008)

---
- **Won the 28th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**

description.en:
The beautiful daughter of the Farnese family is caught up in a whirlwind romance with a notorious royal playboy — it’s the scandal of the century! When the title of “Elvynee Deer” is awarded to the pure and lovely Ingrid Farnese, all of high society expects her to marry into foreign royalty. Cursed in love with a history of broken engagements, Ingrid is determined to stay put at home in Valentine Kingdom. To take control of her own future she’ll make the king’s illegitimate son, libertine and womanizer Regan Espencer, propose to her. But the problem is, Regan is the only man in the country who doesn’t want her hand in marriage! Will Ingrid survive being tossed into the throes of debauchery and reach her happy ending?  
  
Based on the novel by WhiteFence.

description.fr:
La belle fille de la famille Farnèse est prise dans une romance éclair avec un playboy royal notoire - c'est le scandale du siècle ! Lorsque le titre de «Elvynee Deer» est décerné à la pure et charmante Ingrid Farnèse, toute la haute société s'attend à ce qu'elle se marie avec une royauté étrangère. Maudite amoureuse d'une histoire d'engagements rompus, Ingrid est déterminée à rester chez elle dans le royaume de Valentine. Pour prendre le contrôle de son propre avenir, elle lui proposera le fils illégitime du roi, le libertin et coureur de jupons Regan Espencer. Mais le problème est que Regan est le seul homme du pays à ne pas vouloir sa main en mariage! Ingrid survivra-t-elle aux affres de la débauche et atteindra-t-elle sa fin heureuse?

เคยรู้สึกไหมว่าชีวิตของตัวเอง แต่กลับตัดสินใจอะไรเพื่อตัวเองไม่ได้เลย… ตลอดชีวิตที่ผ่านมา เลดี้อิงกริดผู้เลอโฉมที่ทุกคนยกย่องว่าสง่างามเหมือนกวางขาวได้ใช้ชีวิตตามใจพ่อแม่มาโดยตลอด แต่เรื่องความรักไม่ใช่สิ่งที่คนอื่นจะตัดสินใจแทนได้หรอก สุดท้ายแล้ว การตัดสินใจครั้งแรกในชีวิตของเลดี้อิงกริดเพื่อความรักนี้ก็คือ...

description.vi:
Ingrid Farnese là cô gái đẹp nhất trong giới thượng lưu, người được mệnh danh là chú hươu trắng Elvynee. Nhưng đáng tiếc, hôn sự của cô không hề suôn sẻ như lời chúc phúc của mọi người. Hai lần đính hôn và cả hai lần đều thất bại. Lần này, cuối cùng cô gái bất hạnh ấy cũng bước chân vào gia đình hoàng gia, trở thành Vương phi của Quốc vương Severus.
Mỹ nhân đẹp nhất vương quốc và tay chơi khét tiếng trong thế giới ngầm của Elvynee, Công tước Regan Espencer – kẻ được gọi với cái tên Con rơi của vua. Mùa xuân năm ấy, một sự kiện gây rúng động thủ đô đã xảy ra…

社交界最放蕩的浪子—王的庶子，遇上身為名門千金的她！

---

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

altTitles.ja: ダークサモナーとデキている

altTitles.zh: 黑暗召唤师在地下恋爱中

altTitles.zh-ro: Hēi'àn zhàohuàn shī zài dìxià liàn'ài zhōng

altTitles.vi: Hẹn hò cùng hắc thuật sư

description.en: Amona, a dark summoner and demi-human who uses demonic powers, is the newest addition to the party of the uptight priest Roni. Everyone expected the two to dislike each other and to have nothing to do with each other. But to their surprise, on their first day together as an adventuring party, they had a one-night stand...!
description.ja: クソ真面目な神官・ロニのパーティに新しく加入してきたのは、悪魔の力を使うダークサモナーで亜人のアモナ。反発し合い犬猿の仲になると思われた二人だったが、なんとパーティ加入初日に朝チュンしてしまい…！？

description.ar: في الشرق العظيم ، تقع قاره عظيمه تسمى رودينوس في يوم ما ، وصل جسم طائر مجهول في المجال الجوي لمقاطعة كوا-توين ، الجسم الطائر المجهول كان معارضا لجو المقاطعة الاعتيادي ، فلم تتقبله المقاطعة ، لكن كان هذا الجسم الطائر مجرد نذير لشيء اكثر صدمة بعيدًا عن البحر الشرقي ، ظهرت فجاه مجموعة من الجزر ، تسمي نفسها دولة اليابان وفقا لهم ، تم نقل أمتهم الى عالم آخر والآن يجدون انفسهم منفصلين عن عالمهم القديم ويجب عليهم البقاء على قيد الحياة في العالم الجديد ، كيف ستتفاعل اليابان مع البلدان الاصليه في العالم الجديد؟ هل سيرحبون بها كصديقه ام كعدو؟ هذه قصه الدوله التي تسمى باليابان التي تغرق في عاصفه فوضويه في العالم
description.en:
In the Great Orient, lies a continent called Rodenius. One day, an unidentified flying object arrived at Qua-Toyne Principality’s airspace. 
That UFO defied the Principality’s common sense, but it was just a harbinger of something even more shocking.  
  
Far to the eastern sea, a group of islands suddenly appeared. The country of the islands called itself: Japan.
According to them, their nation had been transported to another world.  
  
Now finding themselves separated from their old world and must survive in the new one, how will Japan interact with the native countries of this world? Will they greet it as a friend or as an enemy?  
  
This is a story of the country called Japan as it was engulfed in the chaotic storm of this new world.
description.pt-br:
No Grande Oriente, fica um continente chamado Rodenius. Um dia, um objeto voador não identificado chegou ao espaço aéreo do Principado de Qua-Toyne.
Aquele OVNI desafiou o senso comum do Principado, mas foi apenas um prenúncio de algo ainda mais chocante.

Bem longe no mar oriental, um grupo de ilhas apareceu de repente. O país das ilhas se autodenominava: Japão.
Segundo eles, sua nação havia sido transportada para outro mundo.

Agora, encontrando-se separados de seu velho mundo e precisando sobreviver no novo, como o Japão irá interagir com os países nativos deste mundo? Eles irão recebê-lo como um amigo ou como um inimigo?

Esta é uma história do país chamado Japão enquanto ele era engolido pela tempestade caótica deste novo mundo.

description.en:
A girl who dreams one day, a woman who loves one day. Now I'm a wife and mother of two.

My dreams were crushed by reality, and the memories of love were too short to comfort her.

Her ordinary life, or her..."The Great"

description.de:
Dawoons normales Leben wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als er in den Dungeon gerufen wird, wo er ein tödliches Spiel gegen gefährliche Monster und lebensbedrohliche Fallen spielen muss. Was die Sache schlimmer macht, ist, er ist nur ein einfacher Handwerker mit null Kampffähigkeiten. Aber nachdem Dawoon in eine Falle gerät und einen fehlerhaften Reset überlebt, hat er willkürliche und dennoch sehr hilfreiche Fähigkeiten. Zusammen mit einem blutrünstigen Gefährten und einem niedlichen Eichhörnchen muss er sich etwas einfallen lassen, um das Spiel zu gewinnen und nach Hause zurückzukehren. Welche Abenteuer erwarten ihn in den Tunneln – jetzt, wo die Regeln für ihn scheinbar nicht mehr gültig sind?

---
- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/dungeon-reset-de)
description.en: Dawoon's ordinary life is turned upside down when he is summoned into the Dungeon, where he must play a deadly game, outlasting dangerous monsters and life-threatening traps. To make matters worse, he's only a mere crafter with zero combat abilities. But after Dawoon falls into a trap and survives after a glitched reset, he's gained random but oddly helpful skills. He'll need to get creative to clear the game and return home, with a bloodthirsty assistant and an adorable ground squirrel along for the ride. Now that the rules no longer apply to him, what possibilities await in the tunnels below.
description.fa: ⁧⁧   وقتی که بازنشانی شروع بشه، همه چیز به حالت قبلش برای شرکت کننده های بعدی برمیگرده، چرا بازنشانی روی من کار نمیکنه؟! با یک مهارت ساده بازی برای جئونگ داوون درون دانجن شروع میشه .
description.fr:
La vie ordinaire de Dawoon bascule le jour où il se retrouve invoqué dans un monde parallère, dans lequel il va devoir jouer à un jeu mortel intitulé Dungeon Game. Il se retrouve ainsi obligé à faire face à de dangereuses créatures, ainsi qu'à de nombreux pièges mettant constamment sa vie en péril. Et comme si cette situation ne suffisait pas, il s'avère également que l'abilité dont il a été doté est totalement inutile en combat. Néanmoins, après être tombé dans un piège et avoir mystérieusement survécu, un étrange bug va lui donner de nouvelles compétences aléatoires, mais étrangement utiles. Il va devoir redoubler d'astuce pour finir le jeu et pouvoir enfin rentrer chez lui, tout en ayant à ses côtés un Assistant de jeu assoiffé de sang, et un adorable petit écureuil. Maintenant qu'il n'a plus aucune règle à suivre avec assiduité, que va-t-il se passer pour lui dans cet étrange univers ?

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/dungeon-reset-fr)
description.ja:
｢このダンジョンはリセットされます｣ 一度プレイしたダンジョンや罠は次の｢ユーザー｣のためにリセットされる。 しかしその｢リセット｣が俺には適応されない！？ 絶えずリセットされるダンジョンで唯一自由の身となった「奏多」。 その場しのぎで武装した｢バグ｣人間 定岡奏多のダンジョン開拓期が始まるーー！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/40532)
description.ko:
[던전이 리셋됩니다.]

한번 플레이한 던전이나 함정은 다음 '유저'들을 위해 '리셋'이라는 과정을 거친다.
그 '리셋'이, '나'에게는 적용되지 않는다?!


끊임없이 리셋되는 던전에서 유일하게 자유로워진 존재.
압도적인 노가다로 무장한 '버그 종자' 정다운의 던전 개척기가 시작된다!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%98%EC%A0%84-%EB%A6%AC%EC%85%8B/2373)
description.ru: [Идет перезагрузка Подземелья.] Подземелье или ловушки, в которых была игра, проходят стадию перезагрузки для следующих пользователей.Может, эта «перезагрузка» применима и ко мне?! Единственное существо, которое свободно от постоянно перезапускаемой Пещеры. Вооружившись грандиозной силой, Чон Да Ун начинает освоение Подземелья!
description.th:
[ดันเจี้ยนกำลังรีเซ็ต]  
เมื่อมีการเดินสำรวจดันเจี้ยนเกิดขึ้น, กับดักทุกอย่างเริ่มทำงาน, มันก็จะเริ่มทำการรีเซ็ตตัวเองเพื่อสำหรับ "ผู้เล่น" คนต่อไป  
แต่ทว่าการรีเซ็ตเหล่านั้นดันใช้ไม่ได้กับฉัน! ฉันจะต้องอยู่อย่างไร้จุดหมายในดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้อย่างไร้กำหนด, ฉัน, จัง ดาอุน  
"เจ้าข้อผิดพลาด" ได้ได้เวลาเริ่มออกสำรวจดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้แล้ว!
description.zh-hk:
［副本即將重置。］

為提供下一批「玩家」體驗，
已通過的副本、已觸發的陷阱
都會經過名為重置的過程。
然而，那所謂的「重置」居然對「我」不管用?!

在不斷重置的副本裡，身為唯一的自由之身，
只能把苦力活做好做滿，「農起來」武裝自己，
「Bug仔」鄭多運的副本開墾記就此展開!

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%89%AF%E6%9C%AC%E9%87%8D%E7%BD%AE/140)

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

altTitles.vi: Thời khắc đôi ta hạnh phúc

description.de: Bereits zum dritten Mal hat Juri versucht sich das Leben zu nehmen. Ihre Tante bietet ihr nun an, sie bei ihren Besuchen von zum Tode Verurteilten zu begleiten und so einer weiteren Therapie zu entgehen, an deren Nutzen sie inzwischen stark zweifelt. Im Gefängnis trifft sie auf Yuu, der drei Leute ermordet hat und dafür nun seit Jahren auf seine Hinrichtung wartet. Beide haben ihr Leben schon aufgegeben, zu tief sind die Narben der Vergangenheit, doch dieses zufällige Zusammentreffen verändert sie und pflanzt den Keim der Hoffnung in ihre Herzen. Eine Adaption des Romans „Urideul-ui haengbok-han shigan“, international unter dem Titel „Maundy Thursday“ bekannt, der in ihrem Land äußerst populären Südkoreanerin Gong Ji-young.
description.en:
I have something I don't want to lose. So much so that these terrible feelings have grown. A pianist who attempted suicide 3 times, Juri, is taken to help her aunt at a prison where murderers who killed indiscriminately are sentenced to death. There, she meets a man named Yuu who took the lives of 3 people. A mother's antagonism–a brother's death… Together they embrace the violent rebellion in their hearts caused by the large, deep scars they carry. However, before long, they both embrace an earnest hope in their hearts. "I want to live"…  
  
An adaptation of a novel by South Korea's most popular female novelist, Gong Ji-Young.

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック

description.en:
As an UNLUCKY girl prepares to face her death, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Vicious, violent and buck naked! An unprecedented picaresque hero appears in Shonen Jump!  
  
- Winner of the 2020 Tsugimanga award.
description.th: อันเดดที่ใฝ่หาความตายปรากฎตัวขึ้นต่อหน้าอันลัคที่ตั้งใจจะตาย...!? ฮีโร่วายร้ายที่ทั้งร้าย！โหด! โป๊! แบบที่คุณไม่เคยเห็นมาก่อน ตีพิมพ์แล้วในจัมป์วันนี้!
description.pt-br:
Enquanto uma garota Azarada se prepara para enfrentar sua morte, um MORTO-VIVO que deseja desesperadamente morrer aparece diante dela! Vicioso, violento e nu! Um herói pitoresco inédito aparece na Shonen Jump!

Vencedor do prêmio Tsugimanga 2020.

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: 女ともだちと結婚してみた。

altTitles.zh: 尝试与女性朋友结婚了

altTitles.zh-hk: 嘗試與女性朋友結婚了

altTitles.th: คุณเพื่อนคะลองมาแต่งงานกันมั้ย

description.en:
Two women who are just friends make a pact… "If both of us are still single in 5 years, let's get married." Five years later, they meet again, and their married life begins.  
  
[Serialised in Yuri Hime starting in November 2020.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-10-17/donuts-under-a-crescent-moon-shio-usui-launches-new-manga-in-november/.165322)
description.ja: 「5年後お互い独り身だったら結婚しよう」そんな友達との約束が実を結び、結婚することになったくるみと瑠璃子。恋人だったわけじゃない”ともだち”同士の二人の結婚生活は、何から何まで初めてづくし。
description.ko:
"5년 후에도 독신이면 우리 둘이 결혼하자.”
‘친구’와의 약속이 결실을 맺어, 결혼하게 된 쿠루미와 루리코.
연인이 아닌 ‘친구’끼리의 결혼.
두 사람의 결혼생활은 하나부터 열까지 서툴기만 하다.
약지에 끼워진 결혼 반지가 언제쯤 익숙해질지......
그것은 앞으로 두 사람에게 달려있다.
description.pt-br:
Duas mulheres que são apenas 
amigas fazem uma promessa... 
"Se nós duas ainda estivermos 
solteiras em 5 anos, vamos nos 
casar." Cinco anos depois, elas se 
reencontram, e as suas vidas 
de casadas começa.

altTitles.en: The Best Medical God in the City

altTitles.ja: 一族を滅ぼされた俺が最強の力を手に入れて帰ってきた

description.en:
Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously. Now, and the trash Ye Chen is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" 

This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky!

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちの異世界攻略

altTitles.zh: 孤單一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.zh-ro: Duzi Yi Ren De Yi Shijie Gonglüe

altTitles.zh-hk: 獨自一人的異世界攻略

altTitles.th: นายโดดเดี่ยวพิชิตต่างโลก

altTitles.en: Lonely Attack on the Different World

altTitles.vi: Hành Trình Cô Độc Nơi Dị Giới

description.en:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
description.vi: Câu chuyện theo chân Haruka - một cậu học sinh trung học mọt sách cô độc, đột nhiên bị triệu hồi đến dị giới với đám bạn học. Không giống như cả lớp nhận được các kỹ năng cheat đủ để làm bá chủ tại thế giới khác, nhân vật chính của chúng ta phải ôm theo bảng trạng thái phế vật mà lăn lộn hòng sống sót. Vậy thì, hãy cùng dõi theo và cổ vũ cho Haruka có thể tai qua nạn khỏi, vươn đến đỉnh cao mà không cần tới cheat trong câu chuyện tràn đầy hài hước này nhé.
description.es-la: El fuerte no necesita trucos. Haruka, un estudiante de preparatoria quien gastó su vida como un "solitario", es convocado a otro mundo con sus compañeros de clases. Al ser convocado se encuentra con un "Dios", quien le da a escoger una habilidad, sin embargo... No era lo que esperaba encontrarse.
description.pt-br:
Exilado da classe? Checado  
  
Ser transportado para um mundo alternativo com seus colegas? Checado  
  
 Encontrar um Deus em uma espécie de Limbo entre os dois mundos? Checado  
  
 Pegar uma skill roubada? Não gostaria de ser você, já foram todas vendidas.  
  
 Essa história é sobre a aventura de um garoto solitário em um mundo alternativo, não agradecido a um Deus sênil que deu a ele todas as habilidades que não precisava.

altTitles.ja: 夢なし先生の進路指導

description.en: A former career consultant, Takanashi now works for a school as a Guidance Counselor. During career guidance meetings, he gives headstrong students data and tells them the realities of the world around them, hoping that they rethink their dreams. Because of that, students call him “Yumenashi-sensei” (“Dreamless-sensei”/“Dream Crusher–sensei”).
description.ja: 元キャリアコンサルタントの高校教師・高梨（たかなし）は、生徒から「夢なし先生」と呼ばれている。彼は進路指導時、生徒の「夢」に対し現実的なデータや世の中の実情を突きつけ、否定し、覚悟を問う。それでも夢を追い、のちに夢破れ、どん底の中でも諦めきれない生徒がいれば、卒業後でも手を差し伸べ、「諦めるための授業」を行うのだった。

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.
description.he: צ'יהירו הצעיר מבלה את ימיו באימונים תחת הדרכתו של אביו, מחשל החרבות המפורסם. יום אחד, הוא מקווה להפוך בעצמו ליצרן חרבות דגול. האב המשעשע והבן הרציני--הם חשבו שהימים האלו יימשכו לנצח. אבל לפתע, הטרגדיה מכה. יום אפל ספוג בדם. צ'יהירו וחרבו חיים כעת רק למען הנקמה.
description.ja: 刀匠を志す少年チヒロは、父の下で日々修行に励んでいた。おちゃらけた父と寡黙な息子。笑いの絶えない毎日がいつまでも続くと思っていたが…ある日悲劇が訪れる…。血塗られた絆と帰らない日常。少年は憎しみを焚べ、決意の炎を心に宿す…。
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

title.en: Radiance of Tribulation: The Old Man Leads the Way

altTitles.zh-ro: Po Jie Zhi Hui: Lao Da Ye Dai Fei

description.en: Together with the Demon Lord, he is reborn 60 years into the past. Witness how the dashing elder mercilessly crushes the Demon Lord, all while safeguarding his beloved.
description.zh: 和魔尊一起重生回到六十年前，看帅老头如何暴打魔尊，保护女友。

title.en: Osananajimi wa, Nyaa to Naite Skirt no Naka.

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染は、にゃあと鳴いてスカートのなか。

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

altTitles.ru: Моё перерождение в древо: Начало эволюции

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

description.en: Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.
description.ja:
高校最後の夏休み、ひいばあちゃんが営む旅館「花瀧屋」の手伝いにやってきた佐々木梅。
到着したその夜、梅は露天風呂で滑って、湯船に落ちてしまう。
引っ張り上げてくれたのは…〝ねえさま〟と呼んでくる不思議な少女・藤野だった。

いつもと変わらない花瀧屋。
だけど、炭を使った見知らぬ暖房器具があったり、そもそも季節が夏から冬になっていたり。
これって、もしかして…〝タイムスリップ〟？

時代を越え、少女たちの一途な思いが交差する青春冒険譚、第1巻。

description.en:
In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?

The apocalypse has dawned upon the world, and food and survival are once again the most important topics of people's concern. Rice and flour have become luxuries, and vegetables are even more expensive! But just then, someone posted a video on a website that shocked the world. Sweet vegetables rolled into a hot pot, emitting a tantalizing green color! A golden leg of lamb is seared in oil! Fish soup simmers as white as milk! The little girl beside me begged: Bro,  I really can't eat anymore!
description.zh: 末日来袭，植物与水源全部枯竭。世界陷入恐慌，食物与生存再次成为人们最关心的话题。米面成为奢侈品，菜蔬更是有价无市！然而就在此时，有人在网站上发送一段视频，令世界震撼。甘甜的菜蔬滚入火锅中，散发诱人的绿色！烤的金黄的羊腿滋滋冒油！鲜美的鱼汤炖的宛若牛奶一般纯白！一旁的小女孩哀求道：哥，我真的吃不下了！

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.vi: Ma Hoàng Trác Nhất Phàm vì nhặt được một truyền thừa của Thượng Cổ Ma Đế, mà dẫn đến họa sát thân. Sau khi được trọng sinh vào một cơ thể khác, cũng bởi vì tâm ma của chủ nhân cơ thể cũ, mà không còn cách nào khác, phải làm quản gia cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé. Cùng xem một đại ma hoàng đầy thủ đoạn tàn độc, sẽ làm thế nào để khiến cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé trở mình thành một gia tộc đứng trên tất cả.
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

description.en:
300 years ago, the invincible warrior Hyeon-oh Kim brought down the Tower of the End, preventing the world’s demise. Though he should have died the moment the Tower of the End collapsed, Hyeon-oh is reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17-year-old boy named Juhyeok Kim.

Meanwhile, he discovers the existence of the Constellations, who were once his disciples 300 years ago but were born during the time when he did not exist in this world. Will he be able to find them again and train them?

altTitles.fr: Les anecdotes de la Shadows Draconis

description.fr: Salutations jeunes lecteurs et lectrices parvenus dans nos contrées par curiosité. Si certains parmi vous sauront de quoi je parle d'autres non. Alors allez lire "Akuyaku reijou no shitsuji sama drapeau hametsu wa ore ga tsubusasete itadakimasu" car ici n'est à lire que le concentré des chaps bonus pour les rares affamés, lecteurs de ces chapitres. Le spoil, c'est le mal. Alors gardez-vous si vous n'avez pas lu l'œuvre. (Comparer au reste des œuvres où l'on sort un chap par mois. Ici sera publié 1 chapitre tous les deux semaines) Bien à vous et bonne lecture

description.en: After dropping out of school, Kwon Daegun is preparing for his qualification exam. While working a part-time job in a convenience store he got into a fight with some thugs. Daegun, who easily overpowered them, is offered a project called “Iljin in Charge/The Bully In Charge” by the Educational Foundation, which has been closely watching him for a long time. He, who accepted the offer after much consideration, enters a high school that belongs to the foundation and defeats the core bullies of this school one by one according to the order of the foundation.

title.en: Creepy Pharmacist: All My Patients are Horrific

altTitles.zh: 诡异药剂师：我的病人皆为恐怖

altTitles.zh-ro: Guiyi Yaoji Shi: Wo De Bingren Jie Wei Kongbu

description.en:
Will this treacherous darkness swallow you up, or will you survive as a unique existence? 

Lin En accidentally transmigrated into this monstrous world. As a rare human doctor, every one of his patients was moved by his "gentle" treatment and "sincere" service! 

“Anesthetics? Maybe next time."
"My knife is quick, it’ll be over soon~"

Welcome to Bloodsaw Pharmacy, where we will serve you wholeheartedly.
